projects.name: BioTopia: Urban Bio Space Simulator (Team Project)
projects.summary: Serious game simulation developed for research partners (Food4Future, IGZ). The mobile/tablet game challenges players to implement alternative, research-based food production methods (crickets, macroalgae) to feed a growing population
highlights: Environment 3D Artist: Modeled and textured key environment assets.
Technical Art & Pipeline: Optimized assets from multiple team members for mobile performance, ensuring a cohesive art style and clean asset pipeline.
Material Setup: Created and managed materials and shaders in Unity for mobile performance.

projects.name: Astro Dungeon
projects.summary: A 2D endless top-down shooter mini-game where the player controls a stranded astronaut defending against alien waves.
highlights: Implemented 360° shooting and gun rotation with directional sprites.
Developed a custom UI and local highscore system.
Designed and iterated on the core gameplay loop and difficulty progression.
Created custom pulsating shader in ShaderGraph and used Tilemaps for designing the arena.

projects.name: 3D Turntable Project – Technics 1210 MK2
projects.summary: High-quality, highly detailed 3D asset creation project (57k+ vertices) completed for a university 3D Design course. Focused on technical skill in modeling, material setup, and rendering.
highlights: Modeling and Scene Setup completed in Autodesk Maya.
Implemented PBR workflow for realistic material definition (Base Color, Roughness, Normal maps).
Used Arnold renderer with a 3-point lighting setup for final high-quality renders.
